column5: GOT OUT THIS MORN AFTER DROPPIN LITTLE C OFF AT SCHOOL!  HIT 2 TRIBS ! I HAD CLEANER WATER WITH JUST LITTLE FISH HITTING!! HIT THE SECOND CREEK AND ONLY HAD 1 TO 2 INCH VIS!! LOTS OF GUYS BUT IF YA DONT KNOW HOW TO DIRTY WATER FISH YA AINT GONNA BE HOOKIN!! LOTS OF GUYS JUST WETTIN HOOKS BUT YRS OF LEARNIN AND ASKIN MY PEERS HAS TAUGHT ME HOW TO PRESENT AND HOOK FISH IN THESE TOUGH CONS!!! PRETTY DARN GOOD DAY FOR ME! HURRY UP AND GROW UP LITTLE C YA CUT MY DAY SHORT  LOL                HERES 2 SHOTS JUST TO SHOW YA HOW DIRTY THE WATER WAS     A NICE  FRESH 12LB HEN!!! FOUGHT LIKE A MONSTER
LOOKS LIKE A GREAT DAY!
WOW ur chain shines more then the fish, grabbing my shades now!
Great Job! Those are some nice looking chrome!
congrats on a good day
nice fish WTG
Great day out for you...nice fish.  And don't rush little C...he will have his hand out soon enough. lol
great report CC, glad to see you've been out again over the last few weeks. tight lines darcy
Nice fish, all about the big choker sized roe bags. RF
nice report!  A Net and A coffee cup all in one day!!  Did the coffee cup end up in a refuse container??   G
well done CC,  I've fished the muddy many-a-time and like you said,  I'm one of the guys that just seems to wet a line!  Well done in the muddy water!!
TX ALL ALL MY GARBAGE GOES GERRITT AND THEN SOME!!!
Great day out there CC  And great avatar Dano  Cheers  Craig
NICE GOIN COPPER (USING CAPS 4 U) AS USUAL !  WHAT CAMERA WERE YOU USING? CELL PHONE CAM?  BEAUTY CHROME. HOPE YOU PICKED UP THAT STYROFOAM CONTAINER ON YOUR WAY OUT  P.-
YA I NEED A NEW DIGI BAD!!! AFTER DROPPIN 3 IN THE CREEK AND FALLING ON 1 LAST YR MY WIFE DECIDED IT GOT TO EXPENSIVE AND BOUGHT ME A CHEAP ONE THIS ROUND!!! LOL
nice fish man!
WTG CC!!    Looking forward to seeing a few more of your reports before the season is over......I was missing them!!
You suck!!! LOL.  Awesome stuff CC....you are still the boss out there!!!
AHHHH about time, i knew a post was coming this week forsure  !!! Good Job bud....beauty fish as usual
Good ones...
looks like a successful outing! Thanks for sharing, good work!

If you dont mind CC maybe you can share with us a few pointers about fishing muddy water so all of us rookies can actually land a fish or two, especially at this time of year when water levels are up for the next month or so.  thanks
I was starting to get worried after seeing other chrome reports an none from you . what day and I really like the net shot .
fishing in muddywater sucks  clear water is what sucks i dont like being able to see the fish. its more fun when you cast into a 3 foot deep run and catch bows
wow great fish!  Cheers!
